text: @ed_son It really is too little too late. This is what we knew long before #COVID19 but the #bbcnews chose to say there was no evidence, it was #FakeNews/exaggerated or #Marxist rubbish. The #poor/#disabled/#BAME/etc have always been sidelined by Tories and their #eugenicist politics.
